page.title: 15A Weekend At Home.J.D'Aeth
page.content: On Saturday I get up at 9.00.I have cornflakes for my breakfast.I get dressed and go outside.I play at armies with my brother.My Dad goes into the garden and sometimes my brother and I help him.My Mum starts to get dinner ready.At twelve o'clock we have dinner,bangers and mash.After dinner I go outside and play at armies again.Dad goes into the garden and Mum sits in the garden until 4.00.She then goes to get tea ready.Richard and I then go on a bike ride.At 5.00 we have tea.It is fishfingers and chips and mushy peas.After tea we watch TV until bedtime.Richard goes to bed at 8.30 and I go at 9.00.On Sundays we sometimes go out in the car for a ride to visit friends.Sometimes Dad takes us to the swimming pool.I have to go to bed early on a Sunday ready for school on Monday.
